title: NRL Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 98 Graduate Engineer Trainee Posts
description: The Numaligarh Refinery Limited (NRL) has officially released the notification to fill the vacancies of 98 Graduate Engineer Trainee, Assistant Officer Trainee Jobs. The interested and eligible candidates can use this opportunity to apply for these posts before the last date of application. Candidates who have completed their B.E./B. Tech in Civil, Electrical, and Mechanical Engineering, and Post-graduation, can apply for the NRL Recruitment 2025 . The interested applicants can apply in onlin...
